data.name: RPG Maker VX Ace - Dignified Fantasy Music Vol. 1
data.detailed_description:
Looking for a way to add a little more sophistication and class to your fantasy projects? Look no further than Dignified Fantasy: Vol. 1!

Created by Bittersweet Entertainment, this audio pack includes a variety of orchestral themes that feature complex melodies and sounds. Take a sojourn into the world of fantasy and enjoy visiting cities filled with elves and fairies. Or jump into battle with force and fanfare. Digified Fantasy: Vol 1 is a must-have for all fans of high fantasy settings.

Features:
  • 18 BGM themes.
  • 8 ME sounds.
  • Music suitable for a variety of fantasy settings.
  • .OGG format included.
  • Formatted for and tested in RPG Maker VX-Ace

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS:Microsoft® Windows® XP / Vista / 7 (32-bit/64-bit)
  • Processor:Intel® Pentium® 4 2.0 GHz equivalent or faster processor
  • Memory:512 MB RAM
  • Graphics:1024 x 768 pixels or higher desktop resolution
  • Hard Drive:400 MB HD space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Processor:Intel® Pentium® 4 2.0 GHz equivalent or faster processor
  • Memory:512 MB RAM
